heisig_chinese_memo: The assembly line workers in the pit in a false teeth factory.  They notice a large amount of teeth are missing and follow the footprints on the floor to find out what strange person wanted a bunch of false teeth.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This person got his teeth knocked out by a shovel on accident, but he was happy because he could stop brushing his teeth!
origin_of_ch_char_book: (é½’, é½¿, chi=châ€™ih, tooth) means teeth. We can see the teeth in the mouth (å£, kou). looks like a smiling mouth. This character not only means a mouth, but also means the mouth of a bottle, the entrance of a house or a cave, and a hole, etc.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The word " tooth " from oracle bone inscriptions and inscriptions of Shang and Zhou dynasties starts from " mouth ", which is like a tooth inside. At first, the character " tooth " did not have a " stop " component. In the Warring States period, the sound symbol " Zhi " was superimposed on " tooth ". Please refer to the bamboo slips of the Warring States Period and the glyphs of the "Guxi Collection". " Zhi " and " Zhi " are similar in form and mixed, so "Shuowen" thinks that the word starts with the sound of " Zhi ". "Shuowen": "A tooth is a bone. It has a shape like a tooth and stops the sound. All teeth belong to the tooth."

Oracle bone inscriptions are used as the original meaning, "Collection" 773 A: "The broom (women) is very sick."

The inscription " tooth " refers to the teeth of the year, and the King of Zhongshan's Fanghu: "The teeth of the retreats (all) are longer than those of ğ¨—¥(hui)." Zhang Zhenghong refers to the "tooth length" that is the sequence of teeth, with the elder in front. The whole sentence of the inscription refers to the retreat and the alliance with the princes according to the year. "Zuo Zhuan. "The Eleventh Year of the Hidden Public": "If a widow is in Xue, I dare not dare to have any teeth." Du Yinan: "The teeth, the rows." Kong Yingdashu: "The teeth are the alias of the year teeth; people are arranged according to the year. They are listed in order of their titles, and they are also called teeth." The whole sentence of "Zuo Zhuan" stated that if a widow came to see Xue Guochao, he would not dare to compete with other countries surnamed Ren.

The characters of the Warring States Period are used as the original meaning, referring to teeth, "Shangbo Zhushu VI. "Yongyue" Jane 6: "Lip dead tooth storehouse (cold)." Also used as a new year tooth, "Shangbo Bamboo Book Eight. "Zi Dao Hungry" Jane 1: "My son is old (çŸ£)."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle, Shang and Zhou inscriptions from " mouth " from â—, like the shape of teeth in the population, after the Warring States period, " zh " or " stop " was added as a sound symbol. The original meaning is teeth.

tooth
chÇ

tooth
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[â‘ ] [chÇ]
["Guangyun" Changliqie, top stop, Chang. ]
Also known as "æ­¯1". Traditional characters for "ç‰™1".
(1) Front teeth.
(2) Refers to teeth in general.
(3) Especially refers to ivory. See "tooth leather".
(4) Rows such as tooth-shaped ones. Tooth carved by bamboo and wood. Used for counting.
(5) Rows such as tooth-shaped ones. Clogs tooth nails.
(6) Rows such as tooth-shaped ones. Gear teeth.
(7) Rows such as tooth-shaped ones. The first grade of the step stone is called a tooth.
(8) Rows such as tooth-shaped ones. The tooth-shaped parts on other objects.
(9) The age of cattle and horses. Young cows and horses give birth to one tooth every year, because their age is counted by the tooth.
(10) That is to calculate the age of cattle and horses.
(11) The age of the person.
(12) Refers to people.
(13) Category; peers.
(14) Juxtaposed; together.
(15) Recruitment; Acceptance.
(16) mentioned, mentioned. The extension is attention.
(17) Biting.
(18) Engraved in tooth shape.
(19) Pronunciation.
(20) Block; touch.
(21) means accept.
(22) Dice.
tooth
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [The Department of Teeth] ã€€ Te; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1532 Page 08
ã€”å¤æ–‡ã€•?????ã€Tang Yunã€‘ã€Guang Yunã€‘Chang Liqieã€Ji Yunã€‘ã€Class Chapterã€‘ã€Rhyme Meetingã€‘Ugly Zhiqieã€Zheng Yunã€‘Chang Zhiqie, and the sound of it. [Said the text] The mouth is also bones. Like a mouth-toothed shape. Teeth, male teeth too. ã€Vocabularyã€‘Shang said teeth. Xia Yueya. [Yan ShiguÂ·Anxiety Chapter] The tooth is always the bone in the mouth, and the bitter is also the master. ã€Zhou LiÂ·QiuguanÂ·Xiaosi? Postsã€‘Self-born and above, boarded in Tianfu. [Zheng's Note] A man is born with teeth and a body is prepared, males are born in August, and females are born with teeth in July.ã€€[Release name] Tooth, beginning also. The long-term goodbye begins with this. Those who eat more teeth are long, and those who eat less are young.ã€€[EryaÂ·Shixu] Fang, longevity. Note: Those who have fallen into thinner teeth. Pass for children. [PoetryÂ·Lu Song] Yellow hair and teeth.ã€€ Another year. Also listed. [Zuo ZhuanÂ·Hidden Eleven Years] If a widow is in Xue, he dare not fight with Zhu Ren. [Du Note] Tooth, row also. [Shu] Wang Shizi of the Book of Rites said: The ancients said age, and the teeth are also age. However, the tooth is an alias for the year, and people are listed in the order of the year, and the rank is used in the second row, which is also called the tooth, so the cloud is also called the tooth row. [Zuo ZhuanÂ·Zhaoyuan Year] Make the son and the son dry their teeth. ã€Du Noteã€‘Sit down with the young teeth.ã€€[LiÂ·Qu Li] There is a punish for the tooth road horse. [Sparse] Regarding the age of the king and horse, he was also punished, and everyone was respectful.ã€€It's also kind. ã€GuanziÂ·Disciple positionã€‘Same as å—›tooth. [Note] Tooth, class also.
